course.subject: MATH
course.name: Independent Study: Using E-learning Tools in Teaching Undergraduate Level Mathematics
course.description: In this course, the student will learn all the techniques of using various e-learning tools GeoGebra, from the basic to the advanced one. Then the student needs to using the knowledge to design a series of lessons involving the use of interactive e-learning tools for teaching specific topics in undergraduate level mathematics.  Students should seek the course instructor's approval to take this course.
